titleStmt.title: An homily upon these words of Saint Matthew, chap. 16.v.18 Tu es Petrus. Written first in French by that honorable and learned personage, Monsieur Du Plessis Mornay. And translated into English by I.V.
Homélie sur ces mots de sainct Matthieu. English.
titleStmt.author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
Verneuil, John, 1582 or 3-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, Printer to the Universitie,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A12 B6 (A1 possibly blank, lacking).
A translation of: Mornay, Phillippe de. Homélie sur ces mots de Sainct Matthieu, chap.16, vers.18: Tu es Petrus.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
